Project: Social Media Sentiment Analysis for Indonesian Politicians

Project Steps.Step: Load the datasets for each politician.
Project Steps.Description: Load tweets dataset related to Prabowo Subianto, Anies Baswedan, and Ganjar Pranowo using relevant hashtags and keywords.

Project Steps.Step: Clean the data by removing duplicates and handling missing values.
Project Steps.Description: Remove duplicates, handle missing data, and preprocess text data (e.g., tokenization, stop-word removal).

Project Steps.Step: Perform sentiment analysis on the tweets.
Project Steps.Description: Analyze the sentiment of collected tweets.

Project Steps.Step: Visualize the sentiment distribution for each politician.
Project Steps.Description: Visualize the sentiment distribution for each politician.

Project Steps.Step: Compare the sentiment scores between the politicians.
Project Steps.Description: Compare the sentiment scores between Prabowo Subianto, Anies Baswedan, and Ganjar Pranowo.
